Package fr.sii.ogham.email.sender.impl.javamail

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JavaMailAttachmentResourceHandler
    Handle attachments and add it to the email.
    JavaMailContentHandler
    Java mail API implementation delegates the management of the content to a JavaMailContentHandler.
    JavaMailInterceptor
    Extension point used to customize the message before sending it.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContentWithAttachmentsHandler  
    FailResourceHandler
    Handler that fails with a particular exception.
    FileResourceHandler
    Specific implementation for files so that mimetype detection may also use the file name to guess the mimetype.
    JavaMailAttachmentHandler  
    MapAttachmentResourceHandler
    Provides a handler for the attachment resource based on the class of the attachment resource.
    MultiContentHandler
    Handle multiple contents.
    OverrideNameWrapperResourceHandler  
    PriorizedContentHandler
    Provides a content handler based on the class of the content.
    PropertiesUsernamePasswordAuthenticator
    Shortcut to provide username and password by reading them from provided properties
    StreamResourceHandler
    Implementation that is able to handle any Resource.
    StringContentHandler
    Content handler that adds string contents (HTML, text, ...).
    UpdatableUsernamePasswordAuthenticator
    Basic authenticator that uses the provided username and password.
    UsernamePasswordAuthenticator
    Basic authenticator that uses the provided username and password.
